entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
entry.dcterms:subject: TDATA-D65o

During data collection the questionnaire was asked in March as well as October. Of these data, we have the entire October survey data and that part of the March survey which is common with the October survey.
SPSS portable datafile
